data.lyric:
[ti:23]
[ar:Sam Hunt]
[al:23]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]23 - Sam Hunt
[00:03.48]Lyrics by：Chris La Corte/Sam Hunt/Josh Osborne/Shane McAnally
[00:06.97]Composed by：Chris La Corte/Sam Hunt/Josh Osborne/Shane McAnally
[00:10.45]You can marry an architect
[00:12.73]Build you a house out on the water
[00:15.74]That really impresses your father
[00:17.98]
[00:20.17]And you can find some grown up friends
[00:22.86]And drink some wine in California
[00:25.56]But even if you cut it shorter
[00:27.71]
[00:29.07]You'll always have long blond hair
[00:31.43]You'll always be Memphis queen
[00:33.78]You'll always be my first time in New Orleans
[00:39.15]No matter where I go no matter what I do
[00:44.00]I'll never be 23 with anyone but you
[00:48.92]You can marry who you want
[00:51.28]Go back to Tennessee
[00:53.74]But you'll never be 23 with anyone but me
[00:58.28]We'll always have Folly beach
[01:00.68]We'll always have delta nights
[01:03.09]We'll always be in-between real love and real life
[01:07.98]
[01:09.25]You can ride the train to work
[01:11.53]Straighten out your accent in the city
[01:14.28]Like your folks ain't from Mississippi
[01:16.71]
[01:18.96]You probably got an office view
[01:21.43]Wearing those skirts you always hated
[01:24.31]Yeah you're so sophisticated
[01:26.29]
[01:27.53]But I bet you when you drink too much
[01:30.02]I bet you're thinking 'bout back when
[01:32.51]I really hope you're happy now
[01:34.89]I'm really glad I knew you then
[01:38.13]No matter where I go no matter what I do
[01:42.72]I'll never be 23 with anyone but you
[01:47.70]You can marry who you want
[01:50.01]Go back to Tennessee
[01:52.48]But you'll never be 23 with anyone but me
[01:57.02]We'll always have Folly beach
[01:59.42]We'll always have delta nights
[02:01.88]We'll always be in-between real love and real life
[02:07.61]
[02:17.47]You'll always have your first last name
[02:19.74]Standing in that July rain
[02:22.10]Telling me your mind is changed
[02:24.59]But in my mind you're still the same
[02:27.36]Long blond hair
[02:28.83]You'll always be Memphis queen
[02:31.19]You'll always be my first time in New Orleans
[02:36.64]No matter where I go no matter what I do
[02:41.48]I'll never be 23 with anyone but you
[02:46.45]You can marry who you want
[02:48.79]Go back to Tennessee
[02:51.21]But you'll never be 23 with anyone but me
data.trans:
[ti:23]
[ar:Sam Hunt]
[al:23]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.48]//
[00:06.97]//
[00:10.45]你可以嫁给建筑师
[00:12.73]你们能够拥有一座水上小屋
[00:15.74]让你父亲感到满心欢喜
[00:17.98]
[00:20.17]你可以结交一些成熟的朋友
[00:22.86]在加州畅饮葡萄酒
[00:25.56]但即使你将头发剪短些
[00:27.71]
[00:29.07]你还是会拥有一头金色飘逸长发
[00:31.43]你还是孟菲斯女王
[00:33.78]你永远是我在新奥尔良城的初遇
[00:39.15]无论我在何处 无论我做何事
[00:44.00]我二十三岁的年华 永远只属于你
[00:48.92]你可以嫁给你喜欢的人
[00:51.28]回到田纳西州
[00:53.74]但你二十三岁的年华 只会属于我
[00:58.28]福利海滩上的回忆 永远属于我们
[01:00.68]三角洲的夜晚 永远属于我们
[01:03.09]我们永远徘徊在现实与真爱之间
[01:07.98]
[01:09.25]你可以搭乘火车去上班
[01:11.53]在城市里抹去你的口音
[01:14.28]仿佛你家人不是来自密西西比州
[01:16.71]
[01:18.96]你或许会在办公室看着风景
[01:21.43]穿上你曾经讨厌的裙子
[01:24.31]你已久经世故
[01:26.29]
[01:27.53]但我想当你喝得酩酊大醉时
[01:30.02]我猜你会想起过往
[01:32.51]我真的希望你现在感到快乐
[01:34.89]我能够认识你 倍感喜悦
[01:38.13]无论我在何处 无论我做何事
[01:42.72]我二十三岁的年华 永远只属于你
[01:47.70]你可以嫁给你喜欢的人
[01:50.01]回到田纳西州
[01:52.48]但你二十三岁的年华 只会属于我
[01:57.02]福利海滩上的回忆 永远属于我们
[01:59.42]三角洲的夜晚 永远属于我们
[02:01.88]我们永远徘徊在现实与真爱之间
[02:07.61]
[02:17.47]你的名字永不改变
[02:19.74]伫立在七月的雨中
[02:22.10]你告诉我你已改变心意
[02:24.59]但是在我心中的你 丝毫没有改变
[02:27.36]一头飘逸长发
[02:28.83]你还是孟菲斯女王
[02:31.19]你永远是我在新奥尔良城的初遇
[02:36.64]无论我在何处 无论我做何事
[02:41.48]我二十三岁的年华 永远只属于你
[02:46.45]你可以嫁给你喜欢的人
[02:48.79]回到田纳西州
[02:51.21]但你二十三岁的年华 只会属于我
